reviews.review: Good game. Playing with friends will give you an little advantage so i recommend it. And the game is cheap if you catch it in a sale. The only not so good part is that it will take long to unlock new killers or survivors if you wont spend money on them. Again, on a sale they will be cheap and worth it. Not saying its pay to win, but a few meta perks are hard to get without spending money. I love the game and that it has a big variety of interesting and fun to play killers. Playing survivor is fun if you're good and know your way around the maps, and other tricks. Learning to play the game is worth it and i recommend it. Super excited to see the next killer !
Баланса ноль! 16 ранг убийцы кидает к 1 уровням еще и в пати из 4 сурвов
Great game for solo or with friends.
If you like killing people, or running from spooky tall men and women, this is the game for you.

Great game! Just enough adrenaline to keep you wanting more. You're constantly on your toes as the survivor. Some of the killers have heartbeats, others don't. This is a game you are going to want to play with sound on!!!

Haven't played as killer yet but I've watched plenty of Youtubers play both and I don't know why I didn't pick this game up sooner. Worth the $$.

People may say the devs suck at their jobs but i mean atleast they try and put effort into making the game better unlike a certain somebody whose been working on a game for about 6 years now and hasn't even implemented the main aspect of the game.

I am not saying this game is for everyone, but if you're looking for a game that includes almost all of your favorite movie slashers and you can get behind the concept of grinding, then this is for you. Yes, other people tend to be pretty toxic and the meta doesn't really shift, but It's the smash bros of horror games and it's awesome to play with friends.

I'm so tired of the synchronization error shit, I want to play and get the bloodpoints, this is fucking impossible when 90% of the result is scrapped cause of this bug, if this bug gets fixed, I will flip this review, cause honestly, this game's mechanic is pretty solid, but I don't think it did a good job of putting me on edge unless I have friends on a discord call.

Es un videojuego adictivo, con una buena variedad de personajes, ya sean superviviente o asesinos, y cada uno tiene distintas habilidades para usar en el juego de forma pasiva o activa. Además, subes rápido de nivel, lo que te da las posibilidades de tener nuevas mejoras siendo asesino, o nuevas herramientas siendo superviviente.

Recomendo, porém jogo horrível, viciante, causa ansiedade e depressão. Caso haja alguém competente o suficiente para arrumar a nossa querida hitbox agradeceríamos.

basically the only game i play anymore

 (EDIT: that was a lie i play other games now still fun tho)
 (EDIT 2: edit 1 was a lie i pretty much only play this again)
 (EDIT 3: i cant play 3 games in a row without hating it)
 (EDIT 4: opinion hasnt changed from edit 3. games been downhill since they gave billy overheat. mmr is capped so low its laughable, its pretty much just win 20 games and youre max MMR, doesnt matter if you got those wins playing nurse with god addons/offering, its account based, so next time you play a meme clown build its just gonna be nothing but suffering. survivor solo q is the same as always, doesnt matter how good you are youre always gonna have the 1 claudette who has played 4 games and either dies 20 seconds in or hides in a bush the entire game, either way theyre still useless. devs pretty much just laugh at every change the community actually wants, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1mU1dDbP90M, while the entire comment section on scotts video was just talking about how they wish those changes were real. its honestly a laughably bad game once you get to 100~ hours when the killer isnt scary anymore and you actually learn to play the game and then either get terrible teammates or go against survivors with 4 medkits that teabag you all game while youre playing adept clown

Can be a little frustrating some times, but overall it's a fun game game.  Definitely more fun if you're playing with people you know.  Only thing I don't like is the lack of communication with your teammates.
First time playing this game, played for about 5 matches and got matched with Rank 1 Killers in 4 of these matches. Extremely unbalanced and unfun. Absolute 0/10.

What have they done to this game since the last update?
Used to enjoy playing this game but now the matchmaking is so broken its just not fun anymore.
New players (level 20) are being matched with high level players (Level 10 or below), this is players and killers.
How is a new player or a lower level player ment to compete with someone at level 1?
If you thinking of buying this game DON'T, its not worth it till the matchmaking is fixed.

tried playing again, matchmaking STILL broken, level 20 players being matched with much higher players/killers.
this game used to be so fun and there is so much that could be done to improve the game and bring in more players but this matchmaking rubbish has killed it.
